resources.string: Monitoring is currently turned off. We are not monitoring your heartbeat values and would\'nt be able to update you on any unusual symptoms if they occur.
We are lively monitoring your data from sensors. You are all safe! Just make sure Google Fit is Paired correctly with the sensor.

We detected an unusual sensor reading from your wearable from the past day while checking if everything was good. 

It is recommended that you do consult a doctor for we see a possibility of really small early stage build up of lung cancer. 

There is nothing to worry about, just a preliminary check-up will do make our doubts disappear. We hope you will out well. 

We make no warranty and sometimes machine learning can go really wrong, so better not worry and consult a doctor.
